title: GET_WIND_SPEED
content:
0xA8CF1CC0AFCD3F120x098F0F3C// GetWindSpeed
float GET_WIND_SPEED();Returns: The wind speed in meters per secondExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#local beaufortScale = {
    [0] = 0.2,
    [1] = 1.5,
    [2] = 3.3,
    [3] = 5.4,
    [4] = 7.9,
    [5] = 10.7,
    [6] = 13.8,
    [7] = 17.1,
    [8] = 20.7,
    [9] = 24.4,
    [10] = 28.4,
    [11] = 32.6,
    [12] = 32.7
}

local windSpeed = GetWindSpeed()
for i = 0, 12 do
    if windSpeed <= beaufortScale[i] or i == 12 then
        print(string.format("The current wind speed (%.2f m/s) is the equivalent to Beaufort number %s on the Beaufort scale", windSpeed, i))
        break
    end
end
codeBlocks:
local beaufortScale = {
    [0] = 0.2,
    [1] = 1.5,
    [2] = 3.3,
    [3] = 5.4,
    [4] = 7.9,
    [5] = 10.7,
    [6] = 13.8,
    [7] = 17.1,
    [8] = 20.7,
    [9] = 24.4,
    [10] = 28.4,
    [11] = 32.6,
    [12] = 32.7
}

local windSpeed = GetWindSpeed()
for i = 0, 12 do
    if windSpeed <= beaufortScale[i] or i == 12 then
        break
    end
end
